markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fully Flighted](/Feats.aspx?ID=2657) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653)

</column>

---

You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes. This includes the status bonus to your Speed if you have [Fledgling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2649).
name: Fully Flighted
